about_the_game:
The Modern Day Scaffolding mini kit from artist Kraven3D, gives you everything you need to create construction work-style walkways and platforms. Designed exclusively for GameGuru MAX, these game-ready assets are ideal for adding that extra polish to your games, or for creating a network of platforms for secret bases, or even jungle hideouts.

The GameGuru MAX Modern Day Scaffolding mini kit contains over 70 assets including platforms, working ladders, ramps and a collection of scaffolding pipes and joints. In addition to this, you'll get 2 styles of scaffolding, the classic metal pipes and a bamboo version, making this pack perfect for genres from modern day, through fantasy and into the dystopian and cyberpunk genres.

The Modern Day Scaffolding mini kit from artist Kraven3D, gives you everything you need to create construction work-style walkways and platforms. Designed exclusively for GameGuru MAX, these game-ready assets are ideal for adding that extra polish to your games, or for creating a network of platforms for secret bases, or even jungle hideouts.

The GameGuru MAX Modern Day Scaffolding mini kit contains over 70 assets including platforms, working ladders, ramps and a collection of scaffolding pipes and joints. In addition to this, you'll get 2 styles of scaffolding, the classic metal pipes and a bamboo version, making this pack perfect for genres from modern day, through fantasy and into the dystopian and cyberpunk genres.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
